instrument_mode.description: Acquisition mode: SM=Stripmap, IW=Interferometric Wide swath, EW=Extra Wide swath, WV=Wave mode

product_segment.description: Product type combined with resolution class: SLC__ (underscore resolution), OCN__ (underscore resolution), GRDF_/GRDH_/GRDM_ (Full/High/Medium resolution for GRD)
product_segment.notes: Processing level can be inferred: SLC__=L1 SLC, GRDx_=L1 GRD, OCN__=L2 OCN

polarisation.description: Polarisation field including processing level: First digit = Level (1 or 2), followed by polarisation code: SH=Single HH, SV=Single VV, DH=Dual HH+HV, DV=Dual VV+VH

sensing_datetime.description: UTC date and time when acquisition started in format YYYYMMDDThhmmss

stop_datetime.description: UTC date and time when acquisition ended in format YYYYMMDDThhmmss
